content: smoothfox s beginner s round ripple 12 points created by donna mason-svara aka smoothfox ©2009version 5 0 red heart super saver 4 ply worsted weight color a - turqua 1 skein 7 oz 364 yards lion brand vanna s choice color b - white 1 skein 7 oz 364 yards red heart super saver 4 ply worsted weight color c - light teal 1 skein 7 oz 364 yards skill level advanced beginner size i - 8 - 5 50 mm yarn needle special stitches v_stitch double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in indicated chain space or between 2 stitches indicated shell 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in indicated chain space my ravelry store http //www ravelry com/stores/smoothfox- crochet-designs my etsy store http //smoothfox etsy com my crochet & knit related gifts http //zazzle com/smoothfox* my blog http //smoothfoxlover blogspot com/ if you enjoy the round ripple pattern below you may enjoy these patterns also http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/foxs-rainbow-heart-round- ripple-15-points http //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/smoothfoxs-round-ripple- collection-one note color changes are an individual s preferences i only list the changes in color in this pattern up to round 6 after round 6 i don t tell you where i changed colors use your own discretion and preferences just enjoy playing around with different color combinations instructions using color a chain 4 join with a slip st in 4th chain from hook to form a ring round 1 chain 3 double_crochet in ring chain 2 * 2 double_crochet chain 2 repeat from * 4 more times in ring join with slip st in top of beg chain-3 finish off 12 double_crochet 6 chain-2 round 2 using color b join with slip st in any chain-2 space chain 3 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in same space chain 1 * shell chain 1 in chain-2 space repeat from * around join with slip st in top of beg chain-3 finish off 24 double_crochet 6 chain-1 sps 6 chain-2 sps round 3 using color c join with a slip st in any chain space chain 3 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in same chain space *shell in next chain space repeat from * around join with slip st in top of beg chain-3 finish off 48 double_crochet 12 chain-2 sps round 4 using color b join with a slip st in 2nd double_crochet of any shell chain 3 shell in chain-2 space double_crochet in next st skip next 2 sts *double_crochet in next st shell in chain-2 space double_crochet in next st skip next 2 sts repeat from * around join with slip st in top of beg chain-3 72 double_crochet 12 chain-2 sps round 5 slip st into next st chain 3 double_crochet in next st *v-st in next chain-2 space double_crochet in next 2 sts skip next 2 sts double_crochet in next 2 sts repeat from * around skip last 2 sts join with slip st in top of beg chain-3 finish off 72 double_crochet 12 chain-2 sps note in this and all rounds
